DESSERTS

Gulaab Jamoon

A milk and sugar delicacy. A must try for all sweet lovers.

Jalebi

A sweet dish made of maida and sugar syrup. Delicious and crispy.

Rasgulla

This Bengali sweet is a heaven for your sweet tooth. Try it now.

PUNJABI FOOD

Kulche

Amritsari Kulche is a must try for all Punjabi food lovers. Stuffed with potatoes.

Saag

See how we make our Saag. Eat while it's hot.

Roti

A staple food of Punjab. Made of wheat flour. Simple but delicious.
